nodes.excerpt: Implementing a great email program is the most effective way to grow your business. Discover 60+ growth tactics to increase your email ROI based on the strategic goals you want to achieve, such as: improving deliverability, increasing open rates, and more.
nodes.title: Email Growth Playbook - Increase your email ROI with 60+ growth tactics
nodes.author: Julie Paci

nodes.excerpt: Collecting binding e-signatures is a hassle. Etch e-sign free simplifies this process to three easy steps: upload a PDF, choose up to two signers, and send a signature request for free. Signers can review and sign documents from anywhere on any device.
nodes.title: Etch E-Sign Free - Simple, intuitive and binding e-signatures, absolutely free
nodes.author: Mang-Git Ng

nodes.excerpt: Engineering time is valuable, and securing your application flows can be challenging and time consuming. With OTPfy you can secure any part of your application with ease without wasting any more time and resources.
nodes.title: OTPfy - Secure your apps with magic links and one time passwords

nodes.excerpt: Spaceman is an application for macOS that allows you to view your Spaces in the menu bar. Spaceman allows you to see which space you are currently on relative to the other spaces you have. Naming these spaces is also an option.
